file_results.malicious_behavior: The code contains hardcoded external URL (https://40393dc29bdc15fd0245e3ac19611ae3.m.pipedream.net) using the requests library to send a GET request without user consent or notification. The domain pipedream.net is commonly used as a URL for data exfiltration in malicious scripts. There is no legitimate or documented reason provided for this network communication, which is a strong indicator of unauthorized data exfiltration attempts.
